SEARCH
Package model

Class Sale

java.lang.Object
model.Sale
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Sale extends Object implements Serializable
The Sale class represents a sale transaction. It includes the sale's ID, the customer involved, the pet sold, and the final sale price. This class implements the Serializable interface for object serialization.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Guillermo Sánchez Martínez
